title: Boards icons are glitched out
body:
Hi, 

For some reason, the boards icons for items, champions, etc are glitching out on me x_x Instead of seeing the individual icons I just get a jumbled up array of them, and sometimes I don't see anything at all.

Here's an image of what I mean (taken from a post on the Story, Art & Sound forum):

http://i.imgur.com/6nU8CBP.png"

Any help would be appreciated :) I'm currently running on Safari version 10.0.3.

replies.body: That's a really weird issue!  Are you using any extensions that could be trying to alter the boards?  What happens if you try Incognito or another browser?  Let me know!

Nope, no Safari extensions on my end. Entering private mode doesn't seem to do the trick either, and Google Chrome is also showing the same buggy icons. What could it be?

What makes this all the weirder is that it's also happening on my smartphone:

http://i.imgur.com/oiVKFTP.jpg

Here's the thread for comparison, if it helps: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/8mUMdpyV-galio-has-new-particle-on-his-skins

**Edit** -- Here's what the champions list looks like for me also:

http://i.imgur.com/AUTphgF.png

Weird!  So you don't have anything like add blockers running, and I'm guessing you don't have FEK installed.  Is your smartphone an iphone?  Try clearing your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)  to see if that will clear up any wonky assets with the boards.

CLEAR COOKIES
Open Safari
In the top bar, click on "Safari" and choose "Preferences..."
At the top of the window, select the "Privacy" tab
Click on “Manage Website Data…”
Select “Remove All” and click "Done"


CLEAR HISTORY
Open Safari
In the top bar, click on "Safari" and choose "Clear History…"
Select “all history” (or “today and yesterday”)
Select Clear History


Hopefully that does the trick!  -

I tried installing FEK not too long ago but I removed all the files and extensions associated with it because I couldn't quite get it to work. There may be a rogue file still lingering somewhere on my computer, but I don't think that's the case since the problem's also occurring on my phone.


Clearing my history and cookies didn't resolve the issue :c

Thanks for all of this info, though it sucks to hear it's still happening.  :(  I'm really curious to see to know if it still occurs on another network or location.  The reason I ask all this is to determine if this is a local issue or something on our side, in which case you're best posting this on the[ boards feedback ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback)for the devs to investigate further.  Let me know!
Thanks for the help Porocles, I've reposted this over at Boards Feedback.
Also, I'm going to try to push a re-sync on your boards account to see if that helps!  To get more info, is your smartphone and device using safari on the same network/w-fi?
Yep, everything's running on the same Wi-Fi :)
